events.title: Early Retirement
events.description: {target} has decided to retire early due to {reason}.
events.impact: Cut {target} from roster and drop stats to 0. (You may edit their contract beforehand to remove any remaining contract obligations)

events.title: Draft Pick Penalty
events.description: Team is penalized for {reason} and has their {round} round pick confiscated.
events.impact: When this pick comes up in the draft, select the lowest rated punter

events.title: Franchise Tag Holdout
events.description: Your player is pissed he was franchise tagged. They believe they deserve a new contract and they wont play until they get one.
events.impact: If you have a player on a franchise tag they cannot play until a new contract is negotiated or they leave the team.

events.title: Poor Conditioning
events.description: Player showed up to training camp with his belly hanging out and oreo crumbs on his practice jersey.
events.impact: Lower stamina by 5, speed/acceleration by 1, and raise weight by 10

events.title: Sprinter Challenge
events.description: Player challenged a famous sprinter to a race and {result}!
events.impact: {impact_text}

result_options.impact_text: Speed increases by 2
Speed decreases by 1

events.title: Coach's Pet
events.description: Player seen giving coach a back rub and telling him how great he is.
events.impact: +1 permanent awareness boost and must start the next 2 weeks regardless of performance

events.title: PED Suspension
events.description: Player suspended for {games} games after testing positive for performance enhancing drugs.
events.impact: Player unavailable for specified number of games

events.title: Betting Scandal
events.description: Player caught betting on games and suspended for {games} games.
events.impact: Player unavailable for specified number of games

events.title: Bad Influence
events.description: Player seen waving gun around on live with Antonio Brown, causing coach to address quesitons in next press conference.
events.impact: -4 awareness for player

events.title: TODO:: Player Callout
events.description: {position1} called out {opponent_position} on your next opponent and said 'he ain't shit'
events.impact: If your player outperforms the opponent, +1 to a relevant stat. If not, -1 to a relevant stat. Opponent awareness temporarily raised by 10 for this game.

events.title: Season Challenge
events.description: RB called himself 'Mr. 2K' and vowed to rush for 2,000 yards this season.

options.impact: If player reaches 2,000+ rushing yards, increase development trait by one level. If he reaches 2,000+ total yards but not rushing yards, no change. If he fails to reach 2,000 total yards, drop development trait by one level.

options.description: 'More like Mr. 1K' - Set more realistic expectations
options.impact: If player reaches 1,000+ rushing yards, they receive +1 Break Tackle and +1 Speed. If not, player gets -2 Speed and -2 Acceleration
Player becomes disgruntled and loses 2 Awareness

events.title: Trade Deadline
events.description: Your player has stated that they no longer want to play for the team. They have demanded a trade.

options.impact: Find the best available trade offer and accept it without countering
Player stays on team but loses a step: -1 speed, -1 awareness
Player sits out for atleast 5 games, then returns with -2 primary attribute, -2 awareness. Backup player receives +2 primary attribute, +1 awareness, +1 speed.
Player is immediately cut from the team, incurring any cap penalties. Backup player receives +2 primary attribute, +1 awareness.

events.title: Deflategate 2.0
events.description: Your QB has been accused of tampering with game balls to gain a competitive advantage.
events.impact: QB suspended for 4 games and team loses a 1st round draft pick

events.title: Comeback Player
events.description: {position} returned from a career-threatening situation and is showing signs of their former self.
events.impact: Player gains +2 to all physical attributes and moves up one development trait

events.title: A Russell Wilson Level Decline
events.description: Your veteran QB is showing signs of rapid decline.
events.impact: QB loses 3 points in throw power, accuracy, and awareness.

events.title: Contract Holdout
events.description: Star player refuses to play without a raise and is sitting out.

options.description: Pay the player what they want
options.impact: Player returns to team with a new contract at 20% higher salary and a pep to their step: +1 speed, +1 awareness
Player returns with 10% higher salary
Player sits out for 4 games, then returns with -5 awareness for remainder of season
Must trade player immediately for best available offer
Player is immediately released from team, incurring any cap penalties. Backup player receives +1 primary attribute, +1 awareness.

events.title: Antonio Brown Exit
events.description: Player has a public meltdown during game, leaving the field shirtless and waving to fans.
events.impact: Player immediately released from team and cannot be re-signed

events.title: Concussion Protocol
events.description: Player has suffered multiple concussions and must sit out {games} games for health concerns.
events.impact: Player unavailable for specified games. -1 to awareness permanently.

events.title: Offseason Training
events.description: {position} spent the offseason training with {trainer} and has shown remarkable improvement.
events.impact: +1 to speed, strength, and position-specific attributes

events.title: Aaron Donald Training
events.description: Defensive player worked on hand techniques with Aaron Donald in the offseason.
events.impact: +3 to block shedding, +2 power moves, +1 finesse moves

events.title: Social Media Drama
events.description: Player has been liking tweets criticizing the coaching staff and team management.

options.impact: As a show of discipline, the player is benched for the next two games
Player gets -2 to two primary attributes for 3 games
Choose 2 random starters and give them -2 awareness.
Player receives +1 to Awareness. A random player on the team loses respect for the coaches and receives -3 to Awareness.

events.title: TODO:: Harrison Butker Controversy
events.description: Kicker made controversial political statements at a graduation ceremony causing team distraction.
events.impact: Kicker accuracy -3 for next 2 games due to pressure

events.title: TODO::Cooper Kupp Chemistry
events.description: QB and WR1 spent entire offseason training together and building chemistry.
events.impact: +5 to QB and WR1 awareness for the season

events.title: Hard Knocks Focus
events.description: Player has been featured prominently on Hard Knocks, bringing extra attention and pressure.
events.impact: 50% chance of +2 to all attributes or -2 to all attributes for first 4 games

events.title: TODO:: Jim Irsay Meddling
events.description: Team owner has demanded {target} be benched for the next game regardless of performance.
events.impact: Must bench specified player for next game

events.title: Patrick Mahomes Voice
events.description: QB is suffering from voice issues and can't call audibles in the next game.
events.impact: -10 awareness for next game, no hot routes or audibles allowed

events.title: TODO:: Urban Meyer Scandal
events.description: Head coach caught in inappropriate behavior at a restaurant after not traveling with team.
events.impact: All players -2 awareness for 3 games

events.title: Prime Workout
events.description: Player trained at Deion Sanders' camp in the offseason.
events.impact: +1 speed, +1 agility, +2 man coverage, +1 zone coverage

events.title: TODO:: Aaron Rodgers Ayahuasca
events.description: QB took a spiritual journey in the offseason and claims to see the field in a new way.
events.impact: +3 awareness, +2 throw under pressure, but 20% chance of -10 awareness in any random game

events.title: TODO:: Taylor Swift Effect
events.description: Tight end is dating a celebrity and gaining mainstream attention.
events.impact: -2 to awareness due to distraction for 4 games

events.title: Tyreek Hill Speed Challenge
events.description: WR challenged Tyreek Hill to a race and {result}.
events.impact: {impact_text}

result_options.impact_text: +3 speed, +2 acceleration
+1 speed, +1 acceleration
-1 speed, -1 acceleration

events.title: Deshaun Watson Suspension
events.description: Player involved in off-field misconduct and facing league suspension.
events.impact: Player suspended for 11 games and team fined $5 million (subtract from available cap)

events.title: TODO:: Bill Belichick Influence
events.description: Defensive coordinator studied under Belichick and has implemented advanced schemes.
events.impact: All defensive players +2 awareness for season, but -1 speed due to complex responsibilities

events.title: Andy Reid BBQ
events.description: Coach took entire offense to famous BBQ restaurant for team bonding.
events.impact: Starting Offensive line +3 to run/pass block, starting skill positions -1 speed due to weight gain

events.title: T.J. Watt Effect
events.description: Edge rusher studied film with T.J. Watt and has improved pass rush moves.
events.impact: +3 to finesse moves, +2 to power moves, +2 to block shedding

events.title: Travis Kelce Podcast
events.description: Tight end launched a podcast and is spending time recording instead of studying film.
events.impact: -2 awareness

events.title: Justin Tucker Challenge
events.description: Kicker challenged to make a 65+ yard field goal in practice with team watching.
events.impact: {impact_text}

result_options.impact_text: +3 kick power, +2 accuracy
+1 kick power, -2 awareness

result_options.result: Had the distance but missed it
result_options.impact_text: +1 kick power, -2 accuracy
-3 kick power, -2 accuracy

events.title: TODO:: Matthew Stafford Injury
events.description: QB playing through undisclosed injury that affects throwing motion.

options.impact: player is benched for 4 games, but returns at full strength.
-1 to throw power permanently, but player remains available for all games
Maybe our luck will improve with a different doctor.
70% chance of recovery with no games missed, 30% chance of season-ending injury

events.title: Dan Campbell Intensity
events.description: Head coach gave motivational speech that has players ready to 'bite kneecaps'.
events.impact: Add +1 hit power, tackle to 3 players on the defense.

events.title: Playing Time Demand
events.description: {target} is unhappy with their current playing time and demands more snaps.

options.description: Start {target} for the next two games
options.impact: {target} receives +2 Awareness and +1 to primary attribute due to motivation. {target} must start for next 2 games.
{target} receives -2 Awareness and may request a trade later in the season.
{target} receives -5 Awareness and will request a trade immediately.

events.title: Draft Day Meddling
events.description: The teams owner wants to secure a different future in the draft. They want a {position}.
events.impact: Your highest round pick in the draft must be a {position}.

events.title: Draft Day Research
events.description: A {position} has been identified as a position of need. The owner wants you to prioritize this position in the draft.
events.impact: One of your draft picks must be a {position}.

events.title: Penny Pinching Owner
events.description: The team owner is feeling the financial pressure and is cutting into your budget.
events.impact: {impact_text}

result_options.impact_text: You are limited to 4 total free agents this off-season
You must trade/release a player that will save you atlease $5 million in cap space.
You may not pay any free agent more than $15 million dollars per year.
You may not pay any free agent more than $10 million dollars per year.
Garenteed money is a scam. You may not make any offer with more than $5 million guaranteed per year.
You may not sign any free agents this off-season.
Trim the fat. Cut 2 bench players.
Trim the fat. Cut 5 bench players.
Trim the meat. Cut 1 bench player and 1 starter.

events.title: TODO:: Test deep options
events.description: Test deep options
events.impact: Deep options test.

options.impact: Option 1 impact
Option 2 impact
Option 2.1 impact
Option 2.2 impact
Option 2.2.1 impact
Option 2.2.2 impact

events.title: Is that Kadarius Toney out there?
events.description: {target} was absolutely cooking in last weeks game. Atleast until the ball was thrown to him.
events.impact: {target} recieves +2 to all route running attributes, but -3 to all catching attributes.

events.title: Sue Stomp
events.description: Haven't seen someone stomp on a player like that since Ndamukong Suh.
events.impact: {target} is suspended for 6 games due to stomping on an opponent head after a tackle. Brutal.

events.title: Cody Parkey Curse
events.description: Your Kicker has been seeing Cody Parkey in his nightmares. He's not himself, at practice this week he doinked 5 straight field goals.
events.impact: Kicker has -10 to accuracy for the next 2 games. if in that time the kicker misses 2 or more field goals, the curse is permanent. else he returns to form and gains +3 permanent accuracy (added to original accuracy).

events.title: At practice this week, your team exposes that {target} went on a date with your daughter. Word is he might have gotten lucky.
events.description: What will you do?

options.description: Let it slide. Your daughter is a grown woman and can date who she wants.
options.impact: Nothing happens. Wow does that make you a good parent or what?... I guess that depends on the player.

options.description: Fight him. Right there at practice. You can take him.
options.impact: {target} is suspended for 4 games. Team loses morale and -1 to all attributes for the next 2 games.

options.description: Bench him. He aint getting lucky on the field thats for sure.
options.impact: {target} is benched for the next 2 games.

options.description: Cut him. You dont need him, and you certaintly dont need him around your daughter.
options.impact: {target} is cut immediately. He will not resign with your team as long as you are still in charge.

events.title: My agent says we can't be friends
events.description: The agent for your {target} has informed you that they will not accept any negotiations this season.
events.impact: if {target} is up for any extensions this season they will ignore all offers. You can still franchise tag them if you want.

events.title: No love for short Kings
events.description: your player {target} has grown insecure about their height after a girl refused to go on a date with them. His friend told him about a surgery where they break your shins and extend your legs, sounds painful. Now he wants to have it done.
events.impact: Can I do it coach?

options.impact: Player is out for the rest of the season. they return next year with 2 inches added to their height, -2 SPD, -2 AGL, -2 ACC, -2 JMP
Player loses -5 awareness for the next 2 games, while he mopes around the locker room.

options.description: Say no but with a kind pep talk, 'There's a great girl out there for you and she wont care that you're short'
options.impact: Player is encouraged and lets the issue drop.

events.title: QBs need role models
events.description: Your {target} wants to improve their throwing motion. They ready to watch some tape, and put in the work.
events.impact: Your player wants to know whose tape they should watch to improve their game. What player should your QB try to emulate?

options.impact: Your player will watch Tom Brady's tape and try to improve their game.
Your player will watch Patrick Mahomes' tape and try to improve their game.
Your player will watch Aaron Rodgers' tape and try to improve their game.
Your player will watch Josh Allen's tape and try to improve their game.

events.title: Trade-phobia
events.description: Your GM got fleeced in a trade at his last job. He's afraid to make a mistake like that again.
events.impact: {impact_text}

result_options.impact_text: You cannot trade-down in the nfl draft this season
You cannot trade down or up in the nfl draft this season
You may not make any trades this off-season (unless required by event)

events.title: Participation {award}
events.description: Not every player gets recognized and thats a shame. Everyone deserves a {award}.
events.impact: Choose a player that has never been recognized for an award. They will receive +1 to {stat} skill attributes of your choice.

events.title: Oxygen Chamber Therapy
events.description: {target} has been sleeping in a hyperbaric oxygen chamber to improve recovery and performance.
events.impact: {impact_text}

result_options.impact_text: Player gains +2 stamina and +1 injury
The therapy backfires, player loses -1 stamina, -1 injury

events.title: Hometown Hero
events.description: {target} is from the city where your next opponent is located. The media is making a big deal about the homecoming.
events.impact: {impact_text}

result_options.impact_text: Player locks in and plays with extra intensity. +10 to Awareness for the next game.
Your player folds under the pressure, he loses sleep and has -10 to Awareness for the next game.

events.title: Fan Favorite
events.description: The fans have voted {target} as their favorite player. The team is giving away bobbleheads at the next home game.
events.impact: {impact_text}

target_impacts.QB1: Player gets a permanent +2 awareness and +1 throw under pressure due to fan support
target_impacts.RB1: Player gets a permanent +2 awareness and +1 break tackle due to fan support
target_impacts.WR1: Player gets a permanent +2 awareness and +1 catching in traffic due to fan support
target_impacts.TE1: Player gets a permanent +2 awareness and +1 spectacular catch due to fan support
target_impacts.LOLB1: Player gets a permanent +2 awareness and +1 block shedding due to fan support
target_impacts.MLB1: Player gets a permanent +2 awareness and +1 tackle due to fan support
target_impacts.ROLB1: Player gets a permanent +2 awareness and +1 pursuit due to fan support
target_impacts.CB1: Player gets a permanent +2 awareness and +1 man coverage due to fan support
target_impacts.SS1: Player gets a permanent +2 awareness and +1 hit power due to fan support

events.title: New Conditioning Coach
events.description: The team has hired a revolutionary new conditioning coach from Europe.
events.impact: Choose a position group for the conditioning coach to focus on.

options.impact: All starting offensive linemen gain +2 stamina.
All starting defensive linemen gain +2 stamina.
All starting linebackers gain +2 stamina.
All starting defensive backs gain +2 stamina.

events.title: Weight Room Warrior
events.description: {target} has been spending extra hours in the weight room.
events.impact: {impact_text}

result_options.impact_text: Player gains +2 strength and +1 trucking/breaking tackles
Player pushed too hard and suffered a minor injury. -1 injury and stamina

events.title: Midnight Film Study
events.description: {target} has been staying up until midnight studying film of opponents.
events.impact: Player gains +3 awareness but -1 stamina due to lack of sleep

events.title: Position Change Experiment
events.description: Coaches are considering moving {target} to a new position to better utilize their skills.
events.impact: You must change the player's position to a related position (e.g., CB to FS, LB to DE, etc.). After 3 games, if the coaches decide to revert them back to their original position, they lose -2 Awareness.

events.title: Breakout Candidate
events.description: Analysts are predicting {target} will have a breakout season this year.
events.impact: {impact_text}

target_impacts.QB2: If quarterback throws for 3,500+ yards or 25+ TDs with fewer than 15 INTs, they gain +1 development trait at end of season
target_impacts.RB2: If running back rushes for 1,000+ yards or scores 8+ rushing TDs, they gain +1 development trait at end of season
target_impacts.WR2: If wide receiver has 800+ receiving yards or 6+ receiving TDs, they gain +1 development trait at end of season
target_impacts.WR3: If wide receiver has 700+ receiving yards or 5+ receiving TDs, they gain +1 development trait at end of season
target_impacts.TE2: If tight end has 500+ receiving yards or 5+ receiving TDs, they gain +1 development trait at end of season
target_impacts.CB2: If cornerback has 5+ INTs or 10+ passes defended, they gain +1 development trait at end of season
target_impacts.MLB2: If linebacker has 80+ tackles and 5+ sacks or 2+ INTs, they gain +1 development trait at end of season
target_impacts.FS2: If free safety has 3+ INTs and 70+ tackles, they gain +1 development trait at end of season
target_impacts.SS2: If strong safety has 80+ tackles and 3+ forced fumbles or 2+ INTs, they gain +1 development trait at end of season

events.title: TODO:: Quarterback Competition
events.description: The backup quarterback has been pushing for the starting job in practice.

options.impact: Starter remains QB1 but gets -1 confidence. Backup remains QB2 but gets -2 confidence.
Both QBs get +1 throw power and +1 accuracy from competition. Whoever performs better in preseason gets +2 confidence.

options.description: Make the backup the new starter
options.impact: Former starter becomes QB2 with -3 confidence. New starter gets +3 confidence but -1 awareness due to inexperience.

events.title: Viral Trick Play
events.description: One of your team's trick plays went viral on social media after being executed perfectly in practice.
events.impact: So much for the element of surprise. For the next 5 games, your team cannot use fake punts/field goals.

events.title: TODO:: Locker Room Divide
events.description: Your team is experiencing a serious locker room divide that's affecting team chemistry.

options.impact: Team loses 2 games while working through issues, but chemistry improves afterward with +1 awareness for all players.
All players receive -2 awareness for the remainder of the season.
You must trade at least 2 starters for draft picks only (no players in return).

events.title: Failed Drug Test
events.description: {target} has failed a random drug test administered by the league.
events.impact: Player is suspended for 4 games with no appeals possible.

events.title: Bust bust bust
events.description: Your highest draft pick from last year is a complete bust.
events.impact: The player's development to normal and they lose -2 to Awareness.

events.title: Mo money mo problems
events.description: it wasnt long ago when {target} signed a new contract, but they sure did spend it fast.
events.impact: He came to your office to beg for more money.

options.description: Cut him. If they cant manage their finances, then they arent responsible enough to be on your team.
options.impact: Player is cut and cannot be re-signed for the rest of the season.

options.description: Offer to let him move into your house until he gets his finances in order.
options.impact: {impact_text}

result_options.impact_text: Player glady accepts your offer. He fits right in with the family and he is able to spend more time focusing on the gamme. +1 Awareness permanently.
Player moves into your house. Hes kind of a deadbeat and spends all day playing video games. -2 Awareness permanently.
Player moves into your home and prompty robs you silly. Add 2 million to bonus in his contract before cutting him. He may never be re-signed
Player insults your offer and storms out of your office. He is cut and cannot be re-signed for the rest of the season.

options.description: Pay the man. NFL salaries are practically minimum wage.
options.impact: Add $2 million/year as a signing bonus to his contract for the remainder of his contract.

events.title: Media Criticism
events.description: The media has been relentlessly critical of {target}, affecting their mental state.

options.description: Hold a press conference to defend the player
options.impact: Will you actually back this player up?

options.description: Yes. And I promise to start him for the next 5 weeks to prove it.
options.impact: Player gains +1 to two skill attributes of your choice. But they must start the next 5 games.
Player is absolutely clowned on social media and crashes out. He loses -7 awareness permanetly.

options.description: Tell player to ignore the noise
options.impact: He tries. He really does. But the media is relentless. He loses -2 awareness permanently.

options.description: Bench player for a bit to let things cool down
options.impact: Player must be benched for two games, after which they return with normal attributes.
